source.name: Benefits of Tokenization
source.instructions: Select all the correct statements about the benefits of tokenization in blockchain technology:

answers.answer: It enhances the liquidity of traditionally illiquid assets
It reduces administrative costs associated with trading
It allows assets to participate in the DeFi ecosystem
It eliminates all risks associated with asset ownership
It guarantees a profit for all tokenized assets

source.guidance: The correct answers highlight key benefits of tokenization as described in the topic. Tokenization enhances liquidity for traditionally illiquid assets, reduces administrative costs in trading, and allows assets to participate in DeFi. The incorrect options are misleading: tokenization doesn't eliminate all risks of asset ownership, nor does it guarantee profits for all tokenized assets. These are common misconceptions that the question aims to address.
source.learningObjectives: SWBAT identify the key benefits of asset tokenization in blockchain technology
